inclusion.criterion: carotid endarterectomy for established clinical criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must sign written informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of carotid artery surgery (endovascular or open)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not felt be suitable for carotid endarterectomy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He is physically active and has no other cardiovascular risk factors.
